name: The First Step
description: I want to start off by mentioning that this project is a learning project for me. I am trying to learn how to use Unreal Engine, and for this purpose I have created this game. It is a very simple item collection game. And only has 2 levels. The entire game can be completed in a few minutes. Still, I have tried to make the levels interesting enough to explore for a bit. As well as added a timer, so you can try to find the quickest ways to complete the levels.
